body.p: Speeches and articles - regjeringen.no
New security challenges – new strategic concept
- The financial crisis [...] will affect the assumptions on which NATO’s new Strategic Concept is being based, says Minister of Defence Grete Faremo.
Protection of Civilians in Current Conflicts – Operational Challenges and Priorities
- In a broader perspective, the focus of our work must always be on the consequences felt on the ground, says Minister of Defence Grete Faremo.
Nordic Defense Conference 2010
Minister of Defence Grete Faremo: - At about 20-25 % of the total defence budget, we have one of the highest materiel investment rates in NATO.
A significant joint project
Madrid, 7 September 2010: Signing address by the Norwegian Minister of Defence, Grete Faremo.
Norwegian defence and security policy
Speech by defence minister Grete Faremo at the Heads of Station meeting held at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Tuesday 24 August 2010.
- We will never forget the sacrifices
Today, we are honouring freedom, said MOD State Secretary Espen Barth Eide during his speech at the 70th Anniversary of the Allied Victory in the Battles of Narvik.
NATO’s Partnerships and Beyond

The third key seminar on NATO’s new Strategic Concept concluded in Oslo on 14 January. The event, entitled “NATO’s Partnerships and Beyond”, brought together members of the Group of Experts, government and military officials, representatives of international organisations and NGOs, independent experts and journalists.
Capable and ready for action – Norway’s armed forces 2010
Address to the Oslo Military Society given on 4 January 2010 by Defence Minister Grete Faremo

- The work of strengthening our defence forces continues. Not least because the Armed Forces must continually adapt both to changing geopolitical circumstances and to the new demands of modern society.
Nuclear Capabilities in a Changing Security Environment
Nuclear Capabilities in a Changing Security Environment – a Norwegian Perspective, by State Secretary of the Royal Norwegian Ministry of Defence, Espen Barth Eide.
Home and Abroad – an Army for the Complex Challenges of the Present Day
Address by Minister of Defence Grete Faremo at the 2009 Army Summit, 6 November 2009.
